characterList: 很根即節退腿限眼良浪娘食飯餐館養既概平評邊深探丘

characters.story: Picture very taking form - it whispers "Hen" with vivid energy!
A root tree at heel sings "Gen!" cheerfully - the basis below!
Like a person, this character means immediately and asks "Ji? Right now?"!
Like bamboo, this character means holiday and asks "Jieh? Festival time?"!
"Tway!" Walking backwards, they retreated sharply, withdrawing step by step!
Like a leg, this character means leg and whispers "Tway" - a vivid image to remember!
The strokes unite to show limit, shouting "Shian!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!

"Tsan!" They dined with food cheerfully - a repast eaten together!

Along the border road, your nose catches the scent, singing "Bian!" cheerfully as you cross the edge!
"Shen!" she sang cheerfully as water depths grew deeper - diving down into the profound darkness!
This character represents a spy, shouting "Tan!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
The hill rises like a hobbit-home, singing "Chyo!" cheerfully round and grassy!
